name: WOW Concept
description: A visually rich e-commerce site for WOW, chained department store in Spain.The challenge is to maintain performance while dealing with tones of animations. Yet we need to complete within 3 months.

name: Pinterview
description: I am the UI designer and make frontend technical adoptions in the project, working within a team of 5. It is an interview testing program for internal hiring process. It is also used for mock interviews for developers preparing for certifications.

name: Model Training
description: Data cleansing and model training for academic research. Models like DiffAct and MTCN2 are used. The model is trained to recognize ball types and start-end for tennis game videos.

name: ADI Ohgar
description: ADI is a leading brand in the market for hospitality and home tableware based in Europe. It has both traditional and SPA (Ohgar) site to maintain. Ohgar sales living goods.
